nodes.text: The 481st Legion was a legion of the Grand Army of the Republic that was active at the end of the Clone Wars during Order 66. As part of Order 66, elements of the 481st Legion were dispatched to the planet Ilum to secure the Jedi Temple there and eliminate any Jedi survivors from the initial onslaught.

Once the Galactic Republic transitioned into the Galactic Empire and Emperor Palpatine had firm control of his Empire, the 481st Legion was rotated out and recalled to their home unit and replaced by a joint Imperial Army garrison and an Imperial Navy battle group that acted as a blockade.
The 481st Legion was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 roleplaying supplement book published by Fantasy Flight Games Nexus of Power.
